data.field: never exist be a [http://lists.debian.org/debian-devel/2005/04/msg00004.html|libjustdoit] wrapper read my mind and do all the programming for me be God's rewrite of Perl be the intergalactic community's rewrite of Perl compile LOLCODE run on [http://memory-alpha.org/en/wiki/Isolinear_chip|isolinear chips] probably be out before Perl 6 be a port of Perl 5.496 to run on the new Personal Quantum Computer be/do something else
